transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Good evening sir, Chetna services se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Main Ankita baat kar rahi hu senior manager IndiaMART team se sir. Sir morning mein aapka discussion hamare executive se hua tha Mohit se services ke issue ke regarding.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir to I hope aap jo bhi concern tha se aap satisfied hai. Aapke catalog pe bhi Mohit ne kuch specification vagera add kar diye hai. Abhi koi issue face kar rahe hai?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Ek minute main open karke dekhta hu koi issue.
Executive: Okay thoda time lagega ek do ek din dekh ke aapko bata dega main.
Executive: Sir basically jaise aapne yaha pe mention kiya hai na ki leads ka jo relevant location se leads aane ke liye basically aapka yahi concern tha na ki jo leads relevant location
Customer: relevant relevant location mein leads nahi aa raha aur jo major complaint hai hamara relevant products hai na wo products mein ek bhi leads nahi aata. Okay dusra location se aayega to okay magar wo leads nahi aa raha hai relevant product ka.
Executive: Right right.
Customer: Wo complaint kiya tha wo theek hai.
Executive: So jaise ki hamare executive ne bhi aapko bataya hoga ki hamari jo leads aati hai na panel pe wo AI based hai artificial intelligence based. Jis jis tarike ki aap lead consume karte hai aapko computer usi tarike ki lead aur suggest karta hai right. To aapki jo preferred locations hai preferred locations se aapko filter use karna rahega. Jaise ki aap agar man lijiye
Customer: Filter filter se use kar raha tha wo last do teen mahine se aisa problem ho raha hai. Abhi isse pehle theek se aa raha tha theek se aa raha tha daily leads bhi aa raha tha wo consume bhi kar raha tha aap log aur subscription iske vajah se subscription le liya main. Subscription ke baad mein bhi do din do mahina theek se kaam hua leads aa raha tha do mahine mein.
Customer: Aur do mahine ke baad kya ho gaya pata nahi continue leads nahi aa raha pura pending hua. Main main kya soch raha tha hum log ka complaint hai hamara product ka complaint lagega koi problem hai isliye baad baad mein dekhta hu daily watch karoge to nahi aa raha tha. Iska vajah se main complaint kiya.
Executive: Sir koi issue nahi hai aapka complaint karna right hai sir aap hame feedback denge us process se hi to hum kaam karte hai. Abhi maine ek cheez observe ki aapke profile pe sir aapka jo IndiaMART pe account hai usme kuch preferred locations rehte hai jisse aap deal karte hai aur ek option wo rehta hai jisme aap deal nahi karna chahte hai theek hai. Maine ye notice kiya ki aapne
Customer: Haan wo last time pe last time pe aisa aisa wo select karke wo product ko select karke isme hamara deal nahi karta aisa select karo aisa baad mein wo automatically wo jayega aisa bol diya tha humko.
Executive: Sir sorry for interruption main aapko ye batana chah rahi thi ki aapne lagbhag 651 location ko IndiaMART se remove kar rakha hai jisme aapko lead nahi chahiye. To 651 cities kaafi badi list hoti hai sir to kya aap 651 cities mein deal nahi kar rahe?
Customer: Haan hum log hum log karta hai na wo sirf panch district mein karta hai wo 651 hai na wo pura dusra state mein aur hum log dekhta sirf Karnataka mein Karnataka mein five district mein dekhta magar wo Karnataka mein koi nahi koi list nahi aa raha tha isliye main check karke aapko bata de deta.
Executive: But sir agar itne jyada location ko aap not mark karenge to computer ka jo suggestion hai
Customer: Nahi wo kya hai na udhar main kaam nahi karta deal nahi karta hai to okay usko consume karke kya fayda hai.
Executive: Actually I understand sir lekin 651 bahut jyada locations hote hai na sir. Fir to us hisab se lead ka suggestion hi aana stop ho jayega.
Customer: Kidhar hai 650 6551 ka aapka dekh ke bata raha.
Executive: Haan main wahi batana chah rahi thi aapka aapka account bhi login hai desktop site pe?
Customer: Login hua abhi desktop pe nahi hai main phone pe login hai.
Executive: Phone pe login hai okay aap by lead ke section pe click kijiye.
Customer: Ek minute ha.
Customer: By leads na?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Sir niche by leads hai na isme latest by leads pe click kijiye isme latest by leads.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Do leads dikh raha hai. Latest by lead mein upar sir just a minute sir latest by lead mein jo upar teen dot bani hogi right hand corner pe.
Customer: Haan search by leads, shortlist leads, hidden by leads. Isme by lead preference likha hai sir by lead preference.
Customer: Haan last mein.
Executive: Uspe click kijiye.
Customer: Haan open kar diya.
Executive: Abhi yaha pe ek list dikh rahi hai with the not preferred locations ki.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Usme aap notice karenge 651 locations hai. Nahi ye sabhi ye sabhi hai na 651 mein se panch cities kahi aise to nahi hai jisko aapne by mistake mark kar diya ho ya fir wo near by ho. Because really really important kahi pe hai ki 651 locations hai na it's too come. To agar aap usme check kar paye ek baar to bahut helpful rahega so that agar koi aisa location jo by mistake not relevant mark ho gaya hai to wo aapko
Customer: Check karta hu isme ek bar ek bar check karta hu koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm. Otherwise sir aapke paas ye please ek bar check kar lijiyega aur sir jo latest by leads pe bhi do leads available thi kya wo aapke liye relevant hai?
Customer: Kaunsa recent ka?
Executive: Abhi aapne latest by leads pe do leads dekhi na sir?
Customer: Haan do leads dekha hu.
Executive: To wo aapke liye relevant hai?
Customer: Ek na ek to relevant hai wo dusra location hai na usme nahi karta koi problem nahi.
Executive: Okay. Ek please jo lead relevant hai please aap usko consume kar le so that agar koi aur supplier connect ho jata hai lead consume ho jati hai to fir wo available nahi rahegi to usko abhi aap consume kar lijiye buyer ka number mil jayega rather than aap matlab baad mein baat kare abhi buyer se aap baat kar lijiyega.
Customer: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir abhi jaise maine guide kiya aap ek to location ka list check kar lijiye IndiaMART pe aap thoda sa jyada active rahiye aur sir ek aur cheez discuss karni thi mujhe. Jaisa ki main dekh rahi hu sir aapka jo IndiaMART pe rating hai abhi tak sirf do logo ne aapko rating diya hai. To please try agar kisi buyer se achi baat hoti hai koi leads convert ho rahi hai kisi tarike se buyer se fruitful discussion ho raha hai to aap unse rating bhi le taaki aapke profile pe agar maximum rating dikhegi reviews dikhegi to upcoming days mein aapko buyer call karne mein interested rahenge inquiry dalne mein interested rahenge right.
Customer: Haan theek hai. Samajh gaya.
Executive: And rest sir abhi jaise jo bhi cheeze maine guide ki I hope aap us tarike se services use karenge.
Customer: Haan use karta hu koi problem nahi.
Executive: Sir meri call ke regarding aapke mail pe ek feedback aaya hoga aap agar satisfied hai to please satisfied mark kar dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai mark kar denge.
Executive: Aap ek bar check karenge aapke mail pe ek notification aaya hoga sir.
Customer: Mail pe hai na?
Executive: Haan ji. Aapne irrelevant by leads ki bataya tha na mujhe usi se related. Aap jo do teen cheeze jo maine boli wo aap check kijiye kal main aapko fir feedback lungi aapke email pe ek notification aaya hoga please aap satisfied mark nahi open nahi hoga nahi open kal pe hai na network connect nahi hoga disconnect connect hoga theek hai koi problem nahi hai sir aap usko satisfied kar lijiyega sir ha aur main karu kal isi samay pe connect karu ek bar ha isi time time pe aap list jarur check kijiyega sir so that main aapko jo bhi location agar galat mark honge to usko main sahi karwa pau theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir thanks for the time.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not coming from relevant locations.

- No leads for relevant products.

- Unable to open feedback form.



Resolution:

- Executive explained AI-based lead generation.

- Executive asked to check preferred locations filter.

- Executive asked to consume relevant leads.

- Executive requested to provide ratings from buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the location list.

- Executive will call for feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, subscription, ratings, ai
